mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PY_PCR_CRS_CRT( UUID, CRT_TIME, CRT_USER, TRN_ID, REPORT_ID, BUILD_END_TIME, QUERY_REASON_ID, SUB_REPROT_TYPES, TREAT_RESULT, SUB_REPORT_TYPES_SHORT_CAPTION, REF_ID, HAS_SYSTEM_ERROR, IS_FROZEN, APP_ID ) VALUES( sys_guid(), sysdate, #{crtUser}, #{trnId}, #{reportId}, #{buildEnTime}, #{queryReasonId}, #{subReportTypes}, #{treatResult}, #{subReportTypesShortCaption}, #{refId}, #{hasSystemError}, #{isFrozen}, #{appId} )
